about_the_game:
NULLSPACE is a real-time strategy game that combines dynamic 3D space combat to deliver an epic intergalactic narrative. After humanity launched itself across the stars to colonize new worlds and exploit new resources, a revolutionary discovery has been made: A strange and ancient artifact of an ancient civilization has unlocked the secrets of FTL travel. This discovery divides humans into various warring factions, fighting for dominance over one another.

Nullspace offers a dynamic RTS experience that rewards both tactical skill and strategic foresight. Command your fleet through diverse environments—from asteroid fields to war-torn star systems—and adapt to the unique challenges posed by each faction. Customize your fleet with specialized units and upgrades, manage scarce resources, and outmaneuver your opponents in real-time battles that will test your leadership at every turn.

  • The Junkers: Survivors and scavengers, the Junkers live on the fringes of space, salvaging remnants of humanity’s past to build a precarious future. Their resourcefulness and ingenuity allow them to adapt to any situation, but their distrust of centralized authority makes them fiercely independent—and difficult to unify.

  • The Hegen: A powerful, militaristic faction rooted in discipline and order. The Hegen values tradition and hierarchy, believing that humanity's salvation lies in strict control and unwavering loyalty. Their massive fleets and technological prowess make them a force to be reckoned with, but their rigidity may blind them to alternative solutions.

  • The Dominion: Visionaries, innovators, and seekers of progress, the Dominion is driven by the belief that humanity’s evolution lies in embracing new ideas and technologies. They see opportunity in the chaos, pushing boundaries to forge a brighter future, though their relentless pursuit of advancement often clashes with the values of other factions.

KEY FEATURES

  • Massive Space Battles: Partake in space battles of epic proportions by commanding massive fleets of fighters to colossal capital ships to out-smart and overwhelm your enemies.

  • Direct Squadron Control: No unit is too small. Seamlessly transition between strategic fleet command and direct ship control, allowing quick, tactical strikes to cripple key objectives that might change the tide of battle.

  • Relive the Golden Age of Sci-Fi: Experience a space opera that explores character-driven narratives.

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Humanity has achieved the final frontier, but human nature haven't changed. NULLSPACE is a real-time strategy game where players lead massive fleets in deep space battles between various intergalactic human colonies.
